name: Abstract (1011X)
description:
Abstract is a toy sandbox-style game where you can connect different types of vertices to form complex and dynamic graphs.

The rules of the game are that you can connect vertices by arcs (i.e arrows, or directed connections) or by edges (undirected connections). Arcs can transmit a numeric value, edges provide structure, and vertices themselves can have different effects.

Keep in mind it is currently in alpha-level quality.
